content: The element will be called after clicking

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the action that occurs after an element is clicked. It appears as a tooltip on the "Common:Button" in the PortalSettings categories sub-component, providing context about the main element parameter when interacting with the button.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Element kliklədikdən sonra adlandırılacaq' implies 'named' after clicking, which isn't the intended meaning of 'called' in the English context. 'Called' in this context likely refers to a function or method being executed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Element klikləndikdən sonra işə düşəcək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Appel de l'élément est déclenché au clic' doesn't fully capture the meaning of "The element will be called after clicking". It implies the element *is* being called, whereas the English suggests it *will* be.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: L'élément sera appelé après le clic

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Appel de l'élément est déclenché au clic' sounds a bit awkward in French. The use of 'déclenché' is not the most natural choice here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: L'élément sera appelé après le clic

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'L'elemento verrà attivato dopo aver fatto clic' doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'The element will be called after clicking'. 'Attivato' implies activation, whereas 'called' in the original English implies a function or method being invoked. A more accurate translation would focus on function execution.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: L'elemento verrà eseguito dopo aver fatto clic

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '클릭하면 요소가 호출됩니다' is technically correct but could be more natural. '호출됩니다' implies a more technical function call rather than a simple action. A more natural phrasing would better convey the intended meaning of 'will be called after clicking'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 클릭하면 요소가 실행됩니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Elements tiks izsaukts pēc noklikšķināšanas' is not accurate. 'Elements' (elements) is plural, but 'tiks izsaukts' (will be called) is singular. The original English states 'The element will be called', implying a singular element. However, the intention might be for multiple elements. A more accurate translation would depend on the exact context, but a possible corrected translation is 'Elements tiks izsaukts pēc noklikšķināšanas' (plural) or 'Elements tiks izsaukts pēc noklikšķināšanas' (singular) if only one is expected.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to reflect whether a single element or multiple elements are being referred to.  Possible corrections: 'Elements tiks izsaukts pēc noklikšķināšanas' or 'Elements tiks izsaukts pēc noklikšķināšanas'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Het element wordt aangeroepen nadat u er op klikt" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "The element will be called after clicking". 'Aangeroepen' implies a function call, which might not be the intended meaning. A more suitable translation would convey the idea of the element being activated or triggered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Het element wordt geactiveerd nadat u er op klikt

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the use of 'u' (formal 'you') might not be appropriate for all contexts. Using 'je' (informal 'you') could be more suitable depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Het element wordt geactiveerd nadat je er op klikt

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Elementul va fi chemat după ce faceți clic' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Romanian. 'Chemat' implies a summoning, which isn't the intended meaning in this context. It should convey the idea of an action being triggered or executed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Elementul va fi apelat după ce faceți clic

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'faceți clic' is slightly formal. Depending on the target audience, a more common alternative might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Elementul va fi apelat după ce dați clic

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "එබීමෙන් පසුව අංගය ගෙන්වයි" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "The element will be called after clicking." The word 'call' in this context refers to executing a function or triggering an action, not retrieving an element.  'එබීමෙන් පසුව අංගය ගෙන්වයි' translates to 'The element is retrieved after clicking'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would focus on the execution of a function or action.  Possible suggestions include: "බැලීමෙන් පසු ක්‍රියාව සිදුකරනු ලැබේ" (After clicking, the action is performed) or "බැලීමෙන් පසු සිදුකරනු ලැබේ" (After clicking, it is performed). The most appropriate suggestion will depend on the precise context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Element bo priklican po kliku' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'The element will be called after clicking.' 'Priklican' implies summoning or retrieving, which isn't necessarily the intended meaning. A better translation would convey that a function or event handler attached to the element will be executed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Element se bo izvedel po kliku

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Елемент ц́е бити позван након клика' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'The element will be called after clicking.'  It's a bit too literal and awkward. A more natural translation would focus on the *action* being performed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Елемент ће бити активиран након клика' (Element will be activated after click) or 'Елемент се позива након клика' (Element is called after click - more direct but potentially less clear).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The accented character 'ц́е' is not the standard Serbian Cyrillic pronunciation for 'će'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'ће' instead of 'ц́е'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Element će biti pozvan nakon klika' isn't the most natural or accurate rendering of 'The element will be called after clicking'. 'Pozvan' implies an invitation, which doesn't quite fit the context of a function or method being executed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Element će se aktivirati nakon klika

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The letter 'ć' is a non-standard diacritic in this context and might confuse users. It's unnecessary and potentially inaccurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Element će biti aktiviran nakon klika

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Öğe şu öğeye tıklandıktan sonra çağrılacaktır' is a bit awkward and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'The element will be called after clicking'. It implies the element is being clicked on something else.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Öğe tıklanır tıklanmaz çağrılacaktır

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Елемент буде викликано після клацання' while technically correct, doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'called after clicking' in the context of a Javascript SDK. A more natural and precise translation would convey the action being triggered or executed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Елемент буде активовано після клацання

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'викликано' (vyklykano) can sometimes imply a direct function call, which might not always be the intended meaning. 'Активовано' (aktyvovano) suggests the element becomes active or starts a process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Запущено після клацання' (Zapuscheno pislya klatsannya) or 'Виконано після клацання' (Vykono pislya klatsannya), depending on the specific functionality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '点击后元素会被调用' while technically correct, doesn't fully convey the nuance of 'will be called'. The Chinese translation suggests it *will* happen, but lacks the sense of a future action or a scheduled event.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 点击后元素会被触发 (Jìndiǎn hòu yuánsù huì bèi chùfā)
